attributes.action: Make Foriegner workers take a driving test in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the influx of foriegn workers in the UK the standard of UK driving is at risk. Quite often the standard of driving in other countries is not as high as the UK. The influx of East European workers has resulted in a higher number of accidents on UK roads.

This ePetition is a request to make it compulsory for workers who move to the UK to take a compulsroy driving test to ensure that they understand the rules of UK roads and meet the standards expected of driving in the UK.

The test will help reduce the numbers of accidents and deaths that have been caused by this problem in recent years.
